title: Corrupt RADS
body:
This past week twice my league client crashed when going into a game.  I received a bug splat and in my task bar the following was displayed.

"The file or directory C:\RiotGames\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_game_client\filearchives\0.0.1.7 is corrupt and unreadable.  Please run a Chkdsk utility."

The first time it took a repair that took forever.  (So long in fact that I gave up an hour into it).  Then league was suddenly working the next day.  Now a few days later the same thing happened.  Anyone know what causes this?

replies.body: Running a repair as you performed previously can help resolve issues with bad game files and get you fixed up.  If this issue continues, there might be a hardware issue that's causing this.  Running a chkdisk could help tremendously by finding areas on your drive running poorly, and could fix this through repair.  Otherwise, you may need to swap in another hard drive.  Good luck!
